function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Relative narrow disinfection spectrum and complex impact factors","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improper disposal of infectious and pathological wastes leading to disease transmission","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate disinfection methods leading to incomplete destruction of toxic components","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improper disinfection of hospital wastes and wastewater","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of chlorine disinfection in hospital wastewater may result in chlorine-resistant pathogens.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improper handling of infectious waste may lead to the spread of the sars-cov-2 virus.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper disinfection of hospital wastes may lead to the persistence of infectious materials.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited studies on sars-cov-2 inactivation","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Prolonged survival of sars viruses in hospital wastewater and waste","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 through contaminated hospital waste and wastewater","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate studies on the inactivation of sars-cov-2","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Improper disinfection of disposable medical supplies","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Different disinfection and disposal methods should be adopted based on unique characteristics of different hospital wastes","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Introduction of new disinfection technologies may lead to improper implementation and potential errors in operation","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for inadequate disinfection due to lack of control over the inactivation process and moisture content","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misuse of conventional microwave units leading to ineffective disinfection","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Infectious microorganisms surviving plasma incineration","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor treatment of hospital wastes with chemical disinfection","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective physical disinfection using microwave technology","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficiency or ineffectiveness of chlorine dioxide as a disinfectant","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of systematic studies on disinfection of hospital wastes and wastewaters during covid-19 pandemic","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper disposal of infectious hospital wastes and wastewater could cause serious risks to public health and the environment.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission routes of sars-cov-2 include droplet, contact, and possibly airborne transmission in specific circumstances and settings.","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prediction of unknown side effects leading to unforeseen health by provincial health committees","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate protection and public preventive guidance in the prevention kg may result to misinformed treatment decisions for covid-19.","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate representation of filter bed moisture and pathogens","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Potential spread of indoor microbial pollution due to the use of biofiltration system for degradation of formaldehyde and vocs in the air.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient removal of formaldehyde and toluene due to incorrect measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate filtration of toluene and formaldehyde due to low bed water content","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Slow decay of emission rate of formaldehyde and toluene","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Maximum clean air provided by the dbaf","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of specific chemicals such as formaldehyde and acetaldehyde in the testing process can environment","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"}]}
